channel.title: [pi] Nother NpcDrop Question!
channel.description:
OK So i want to make some items droped by dust devils easy and some hard to get can i do it this way?
#Dust Devil 1624:40 995:200000.. Ect
#Dust Devil 1624:90 1040:1?
Could i Do this?

item.title: [pi] Nother NpcDrop Question!
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

So can i change the Rarity for someitems so their like 10% chance and others are like 70% chance

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Nother NpcDrop Question!
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

[quote=“pasta186, post:2, topic:397946”]If your using Delta,then go into npcdrops.cfg and this is what you should see(pretty much)


npcdrop = 2263	5509	1	10

2263-npcid
5509-item being dropped
1-amount
10-drop rate[/quote]

He’s using PI, his packaging -.-.

#Dust Devil
NPC ID(1624):RARE DROP PERCENTAGE (40) item id:ammount etc - all this line is randomly drop based.
Item id:ammount item id:ammount etc - this is dropped based on what percentage number you put - for instance, you put 40 so the drop percentage to get a specific item is 60%.

Also making a whole new method for a npc isn’t efficient so keep everything on the first line, and the harder items on the second.

Read full topic
